pageContext.claim: “But GDP [gross domestic product] in particular, it was stuck and heading down. ”
pageContext.analysis: GDP growth hit 3.2 percent in the first quarter of 2015 while Obama was still in office, after a sustained period of job creation since the Great Recession, and reached 2.8 percent in the third quarter of 2016. GDP growth did fall in the 4th quarter, but Trump is pushing it to call it "stuck."
